comments.content:
That's so true, I had the same difficulty making small talks in Mandarin! Beetalk is actually easier since I can correct myself or choose not to respond immediately.

I have had cute girls initiate a conversation with me in the elevator only to leave without telling me her number. My only advice is if you do live in Taipei, try hang out at Brass monkey during the weekends. Most locals are able to speak English there.

You would be surprised how many ladies actually prefer a guy who speaks good English!

first.content: Hey there Sam :) Beetalk is hard for me cuz I'm first judged with what can been seen outside instead of my personality. I'm not too eager anyways 🤷🏻‍♂️ pfft, I'd initiate a conversation with you too if I were a girl 😂 not sure if I'd do the same with myself 🤔 Unfortunately I don't live in Taipei, rather I live in somewhat the most "chill" (boring) town in Taiwan, Pingtung 🙄 Thanks for the advice tho, I will check that place out when I visit Taipei next time :))
